properties.name: Atlanta, GA
properties.description: Posted by Hharris9This is my Uncle Rich\'s House in Atlanta. Here, we picked up my grandmother and stayed the night until we could continue on to Ft. Lauderdale the next day...

properties.name: Ft. Lauderdale: Port
properties.description: Posted by Hharris9Our ship left out of Ft. Lauderdale, Carribean bound! 2 days at sea until we reach our first stop: St. Maarten!

properties.name: Ft. Lauderdale: The Beach
properties.description: Posted by Hharris9  We were lucky enough to get to Ft. Lauderdale about an hour before sunrise... since our cruise didn\'t board until noon, we decided to head over to the beach to take pictures.

properties.name: Knoxville, TN
properties.description: Posted by Hharris9We started out at Andy Holt in Knoxville, TN and then drove to Soddy-Daisy (outside of Chattanooga)... (For the record, all of the pictures in each of my locations were taken by me. I didn\'t upload the massive original files, but they are available upon request!)

properties.name: Marigot, St. Martin
properties.description: Posted by Hharris9We took a cab to the French side of the island, where we were able to explore before we had to get back to the ship. Next stop, St. Lucia!

properties.name: Phillipsburg, St. Maarten
properties.description: Posted by Hharris9This was our first stop, and probably the most beautiful of the entire cruise. The water was clear and blue and it was a gorgeous day! St. Maarten is the Dutch side of the island, but we also visited St. Martin, the French side.

properties.name: Port Zante, St. Kitts
properties.description: Posted by Hharris9This was our final stop! In Port Zante, we spent most of our time shopping for last minute souveniers. The landscape was beautiful, and again, it was a perfect day!

properties.name: Soddy-Daisy, TN
properties.description: Posted by Hharris9My home! Our first stop. The cruise that I went on was with my whole family. We\'ll be picking some more up in our next stop... Atlanta, GA! (The picture, as you might have guessed, wasn\'t taken in our house. It\'s the only group picture I had of the whole family on the trip. It was taken on the last night of the cruise with our waiters, Juan Carlos and Warren. I\'m the sunburned brunette at the bottom. My sister had it worse than I did, though. Ouch!)

properties.name: Soufriere, St. Lucia
properties.description: Posted by Hharris9The second stop on our cruise was St. Lucia. It wasn\'t as nice a day at first, but by afternoon, it had cleared up substantially. We explored the town and got back on the boat for our next stop: St. Kitts. (Don\'t worry, I know the chicken looks expensive, but it was in ECU - East Caribbean Units, which are about .70 to US, if I remember correctly..)

properties.name: Valdosta, GA
properties.description: Posted by Hharris9In Valdosta, we stopped to get food, fill up on cheap(er) gas, and stretch our legs... onto Ft. Lauderdale!
